description: collage-like image with printed text at top including, "EVEN ZOMBIES NEED A LITTLE ROMANCE" in red; Starship Enterprise at center, with red and green elements that can be viewed with 3-D glasses; arm and hand in yellow in LRQ; part of a feathered Native American headdress, URC; head and shoulders of a cartoon woman wearing a low-cut yellow blouse at left below center; blue swirling forms in background
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Mark and Stamp LRC in pencil: [(illegible signature) 2012]; on ba
medium: Color monotype/inverse intaglio with hand-drawn additions in watercolor, ink, graphite and crayon
title: Zombies Need Romance
